import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-conversation-chat-modal', templateUrl: './conversation-chat-modal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./conversation-chat-modal.component.css'] }) export class ConversationChatModalComponent { activeLinks: string[] = []; toggleLink(link: string, event: Event): void { event.preventDefault(); if (this.activeLinks.includes(link)) { this.activeLinks = this.activeLinks.filter(l => l !== link); } else { this.activeLinks.push(link); } } clearLink(link: string, event: Event): void { event.preventDefault(); event.stopPropagation(); this.activeLinks = this.activeLinks.filter(l => l !== link); } isActiveLink(link: string): boolean { return this.activeLinks.includes(link); } }
